question: I usually miss my fajr prayer,what shall i do to my recover my missed prayer, shall i pray when i get up or it is correct to pray before the next noon prayer, guide me into this
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Firstly, you must make every effort to perform your Fajr Salaat on time with
Jamaat. If for some reason, you oversleep and there was no one to wake you
up, then you must make the Salaat as soon as you get up as long as it is not
the forbidden time, i.e. sunrise.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
